definition.de: Die Gemeinschaft von zwei Individuen, die sich Treue, Respekt und gegenseitige Unterstützung versprechen
definition.dk: De ceremonier og festligheder, der finder sted, når to mennesker gifter sig.
definition.en-GB: The legal or socially recognised union of individuals, which establishes rights and obligations between them
definition.en-US: The legal or socially recognized union of individuals, which establishes rights and obligations between them
definition.pt-BR: União de duas pessoas que juram fidelidade, respeito e apoio mútuos.
definition.pt-PT: União de duas pessoas que juram fidelidade, respeito e apoio mútuos.
definition.se: En lagstadgad relation mellan två personer. Kan ske genom bröllop, borgerlig vigsel eller motsvarande procedur.
definition.zh-Hans: 相互忠诚、尊重和支持的两个人的结合
